thread.section_title: The Nutty Company Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of The Nutty Company | nutty.com
thread.title: miriam
thread.title_full: The Nutty Company reviewed by miriam

author: miriam
title: miriam
text: Their prices are great and I've reordered twice. The first time, they called right away to let me know one of the things I wanted was on a long back order and did i want to have a substitution free of charge. I said yes and thank-you for letting me know. The 2nd time (a few months later), I heard nothing except an email saying they'd alert me when my order would ship. After over a week, I called them and asked where is my order and the rep told me they were out of the (same) thing and it's finally in and they'd be shipping the next day. I told them that I already had to go to retail and buy some replacements. He apologized but I think he should have offered me a credit for what I had to buy.
